DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Assess effect acupuncture acupressure pain , sedation , use opiate medication patient moderate severe pain related stage III IV pancreatic cancer . - Determine whether controlled trial therapy warrant patient population . - Provide data aid design warrant study therapy patient population . OUTLINE : Patients receive acupuncture treatment comprise 20 minute needle insertion arm abdomen depth use traditional Chinese medicine approximately day 4 , 7 , 11 , 14 . After acupuncture treatment , acupuncturist applies/reapplies acupressure device insert 2-6 small needle ( stud ) abdomen ( held place surgical tape ) tap tiny metal ball 3 point ear . Patients caregiver instruct administer acupressure press ear point ( metal ball ) 1-2 minute per point move semi-permanent abdominal needle small circular movement finger , rate 2-3 cycle per second , 1-2 minute per point , upon wake morning early afternoon . Patients caregiver also instruct stimulate `` rescue point '' ( Shenmen auricular point ) patient experience pain exacerbation time day . Patients respond well acupuncture offer treatment . Pain assess use numerical rating scale approximately day 1-4 , 7 , 11 , 14-17 . Sedation assess use Profile Mood States ( POMS ) approximately day 3 17 . Analgesic medication use assess approximately day 1-3 15-17 . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 10-29 patient accrue study within approximately 2 year .
